Khachkar.Location: Amaghu Valley, Vayodz Dzor Province, Armenia
Khachkar.Scenario: Scenario: Freestanding sculptural object at Noravank Monastery Complex
Khachkar.ImportantFeatures: Khachkar is in bad condition, and if we look on the bottom line of the main cross, we can assure that the two wings of the cross had two triple- loops. Rosette has a form of a flower, which has various palm decorations inside. There are also palm leaves originating from the bottom part of the rosette. The right and the left sides have various geometric ornaments.
